verses.text: These \add are\add* the statutes and judgments , which ye shall observe to do in the land , which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* God of thy fathers giveth thee to possess it, all the days that ye live upon the earth.

Ye shall utterly destroy all the places , wherein the nations which ye shall possess served their gods , upon the high mountains , and upon the hills , and under every green tree :\f + \fr 12.2 \ft possess: or, inherit\f*

And ye shall overthrow their altars , and break their pillars , and burn their groves with fire ; and ye shall hew down the graven images of their gods , and destroy the names of them out of that place.\f + \fr 12.3 \ft overthrow: Heb. break down\f*
Ye shall not do so unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your God. \p

But unto the place which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your God shall choose out of all your tribes to put his name there, \add even\add* unto his habitation shall ye seek , and thither thou shalt come :

And thither ye shall bring your burnt offerings , and your sacrifices , and your tithes , and heave offerings of your hand , and your vows , and your freewill offerings , and the firstlings of your herds and of your flocks :

And there ye shall eat before the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* your God , and ye shall rejoice in all that ye put your hand unto, ye and your households , wherein the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy God hath blessed thee.
Ye shall not do after all \add the things\add* that we do here this day , every man whatsoever \add is\add* right in his own eyes.
For ye are not as yet come to the rest and to the inheritance , which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your God giveth you.

But \add when\add* ye go over Jordan , and dwell in the land which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your God giveth you to inherit , and \add when\add* he giveth you rest from all your enemies round about , so that ye dwell in safety ;

Then there shall be a place which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* your God shall choose to cause his name to dwell there; thither shall ye bring all that I command you; your burnt offerings , and your sacrifices , your tithes , and the heave offering of your hand , and all your choice vows which ye vow unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*:  +  r 12.11  t your choice…: Heb. the choice of your vows *

And ye shall rejoice before the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your God , ye, and your sons , and your daughters , and your menservants , and your maidservants , and the Levite that \add is\add* within your gates ; forasmuch as he hath no part nor inheritance with you.
Take heed to thyself that thou offer not thy burnt offerings in every place that thou seest :
But in the place which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall choose in one of thy tribes , there thou shalt offer thy burnt offerings , and there thou shalt do all that I command thee.

Notwithstanding thou mayest kill and eat flesh in all thy gates , whatsoever thy soul lusteth after , according to the blessing of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God which he hath given thee: the unclean and the clean may eat thereof, as of the roebuck , and as of the hart.
Only ye shall not eat the blood ; ye shall pour it upon the earth as water. \p

¶ Thou mayest not eat within thy gates the tithe of thy corn , or of thy wine , or of thy oil , or the firstlings of thy herds or of thy flock , nor any of thy vows which thou vowest , nor thy freewill offerings , or heave offering of thine hand :

But thou must eat them before the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy God in the place which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy God shall choose , thou, and thy son , and thy daughter , and thy manservant , and thy maidservant , and the Levite that \add is\add* within thy gates : and thou shalt rejoice before the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy God in all that thou puttest thine hands unto.
Take heed to thyself that thou forsake not the Levite as long as thou livest upon the earth.\f + \fr 12.19 \ft as long…: Heb. all thy days\f* \p

¶ When the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God shall enlarge thy border , as he hath promised thee, and thou shalt say , I will eat flesh , because thy soul longeth to eat flesh ; thou mayest eat flesh , whatsoever thy soul lusteth after.

If the place which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy God hath chosen to put his name there be too far from thee, then thou shalt kill of thy herd and of thy flock , which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath given thee, as I have commanded thee, and thou shalt eat in thy gates whatsoever thy soul lusteth after.
Even as the roebuck and the hart is eaten , so thou shalt eat them: the unclean and the clean shall eat \add of\add* them alike.
Only be sure that thou eat not the blood : for the blood \add is\add* the life ; and thou mayest not eat the life with the flesh.\f + \fr 12.23 \ft be…: Heb. be strong\f*
Thou shalt not eat it; thou shalt pour it upon the earth as water.
Thou shalt not eat it; that it may go well with thee, and with thy children after thee, when thou shalt do \add that which is\add* right in the sight of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
Only thy holy things which thou hast, and thy vows , thou shalt take , and go unto the place which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall choose :

And thou shalt offer thy burnt offerings , the flesh and the blood , upon the altar of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy God : and the blood of thy sacrifices shall be poured out upon the altar of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy God , and thou shalt eat the flesh.

Observe and hear all these words which I command thee, that it may go well with thee, and with thy children after thee for ever , when thou doest \add that which is\add* good and right in the sight of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God. \p

¶ When the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God shall cut off the nations from before thee, whither thou goest to possess them, and thou succeedest them, and dwellest in their land ;\f + \fr 12.29 \ft succeedest…: Heb. inheritest, or, possessest them\f*

Take heed to thyself that thou be not snared by following them, after that they be destroyed from before thee; and that thou enquire not after their gods , saying , How did these nations serve their gods ? even so will I do likewise.\f + \fr 12.30 \ft by…: Heb. after them\f*

Thou shalt not do so unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy God : for every abomination to the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, which he hateth , have they done unto their gods ; for even their sons and their daughters they have burnt in the fire to their gods.  +  r 12.31  t to the: Heb. of the *
What thing soever I command you, observe to do it: thou shalt not add thereto, nor diminish from it.
